website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice from one of the top manufacturers, this is far more than just a juicer.
pros: Like all of the Omega masticating juicers, this model is easy to use and clean
This one is multi-functional: in addition to making juice, you can use it to process nut butter, grind coffee, and more
cons: The small feed tube means larger fruits and vegetables have to be chopped to juice

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy from this company
customer_reviews.text: Worst experience ever The machine stopped working after four times ! In addition , I spent a lot of money on greens to juice that I have to throw away They won’t even pick up the juicer They said I have to send it Don’t buy from this company
customer_reviews.author: susan gale

customer_reviews.title: USED AND BROKEN ON RECEIVING IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This might very well be a great juicer - but I have NO idea ... because I PURCHASED a BRAND NEW Juicer, only to open the package, and find a juicer with old beet juice stains on it, pulp still in the collection bin, a chipped auger, and missing parts. What the heck amazon?! Seriously trying to pass off a returned BROKEN AND USED JUICER as a brand new one with the same price tag? What a joke and disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mac

customer_reviews.title: Kids love using this juicer.
customer_reviews.text: The best slow juicer ever. The kids have made sorbet....pasta....fruit juice. I bought glass bottles to make veggie juice...to send to our neighbors during this Covid 19 times.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Overheating - smoke - disaster.
customer_reviews.text: Well, horrible. Within 5 minutes of use, smoke started coming out and overheating. I switched it off and it wouldn't turn back on. I let it cool down, and turned it on again, but same thing happened....
customer_reviews.author: Elie Hannouche

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing does begin to explain this experience. Threw my money away!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this juicer for my husband who has cancer. Unfortunately, I didn't realise that it was a US product and we live in Australia. With hopes of providing healthy juices to strengthen my husband, it was disappointing to learn that the juicer would not work in this country. When contacting Omega they provided no assistance. End of story. So I'm stuck with a machine that doesn't work and have lost $650.00. To all those out there, be cautious of where your electrical products are coming from.
customer_reviews.author: Finnigan

customer_reviews.title: The King of all juicers
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? The thing lives up to the hype. Lots of juice, and comes with a strainer, and 15 year warranty.. What u waiting for?! Give your body the raw, live nutrients it is craving craving. Feed yourself back to life ladies and gentlemen. I know I am Cleaning Easy. Juice, high yield Quality HIGH. Power, Powerful. Longevity, 15 year warranty says Something. Get it
customer_reviews.author: L. Leblanc

customer_reviews.title: It was dirty!
customer_reviews.text: My juicer came used... I’m not even going to complain. I’m over it already. Now if I can kindly get a refund, BRAND NEW juicer and a $20 dollar gift card for my disappointment and wasted time... it would be greatly appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Riah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite juicer!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this juicer. The first thing I noticed is that it's quiet, my two dogs didn't even bark when I turned it on and they bark at everything. But this also means I can juice and not wake up the whole house. I am impressed with how powerful it is it doesn't hesitate and the motor remains consistent with no hesitation. However when I juice, I mix up the fruit and veggies so that after I toss in something like a carrot or kale I follow it up with something juicy such as an apple or lemon or cucumber which I find lubricates and clears the chute. Excellent juicier, I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: gapeach

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, sturdy, powerful juicer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this juicer after extensive research and trial of a cheaper juicer. I love this juicer, I don't have to chop my celery, I can just wash it and feed the long steams of celery. I have not tried juicing other things, but so far, I am very happy with it. Only issue I find is the size and weight, machine it's big and heavy, and I have to have it on top of counter all the time, too heavy to be putting it away every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: I have been sending Amazon and OMEGA emails through Instagram and website. Neither one has returned my email. The second week after using this machine for 10 days for celery, it started to BACK up in the shoot. It is HORRIFIC when you spend 300.00 on a machine that you cannot use and they ignore your emails so you go over the 30 day return policy. VERY unfair. Since the Medical Medium promotes this product, they obviously need help selling their products because they are NOT reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Bell

customer_reviews.title: We love our juicer
customer_reviews.text: We love our Omega! We use this juicer every weekday. I look forward to it. I grow my own wheat grass and this juicer juices it beautifully with parsley and greens from my garden. I did a lot of research and for the price this is one of the superior juicers moderately priced. Be patient as the nutrients and goodness of the fruits a veggies are what this juicer gives you. Don’t hesitate to use this juicer. The results are
customer_reviews.author: salaya

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to Clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer so very much! It juices 10x more slowly than any other juicer I’ve had but it extracts more juice and leaves behind clean, dry, pulp. But the real reason I love it is how super easy it is to clean! I live in an RV and juice on the road. I don’t have a lot of water to spare to clean a juicer. This baby cleans up with only the tinyest amount of water and takes no time at all! Which more than makes up for the extra time juicing. Absolutely worth the money! Hey!!! Get juicing! 😄
customer_reviews.author: Erin C.

customer_reviews.title: It’s not free to return this product!
customer_reviews.text: It would take a lot of efforts to put pieces together before you use it and takes even more efforts and time to separate and wash after you get a tiny cup of juice. Worse, even though this product belongs to Amazon prime and labeled “free return”, the only free return option is amazon drop off and this only drop off location in the northern Virginia area is 24 miles away. We were forced to pay to return our order.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Potential Money Pit
customer_reviews.text: Beware- If you need to replace one part you might have to replace all. Bought the 8006 about a year a go and have enjoyed this juicer's performance. However, bought a replacement drum due mold in the seals in the original drum. Received the drum and found the original front end juicer cap did not fit. Bought a new cap and then found the original hopper on top does not fit as it is unstable. Pressed on and made juice and found the quality is not the same. So we are now looking at replacing the original auger. A after initial purchase, we will have spent close to an additional $200.00 to get it back to original performance... hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: What a great juicer!
customer_reviews.text: After having a Breville juicer for a year, I decided to finally give this a try. I should've bought the Omega juicer to begin with, but I din't want to spend so much money. Compare to Breville juicer, the Omega juicer has only pros-very low noise level, it is very easy to assemble and its very easy to clean! Also, because it's slower, it doesn't overheat the juice, and the taste of the juice is amazing! I have been using it mostly to make a celelry juice, but looking forward to use it with different ingredients. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Z

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: Works with all types of vegetables and fruits (leafy greens, hard fruits) and extracts maximum juice from the fruit. Takes less than five minutes to clean.It’s relatively easy to put all together and its parts are safe to be put in the dishwasher. The box even comes with a cleaning brush that can be used to clean and dislodge stuck pulp. While cleaning the Omega is easy as you can just run water through it, to clean it fully, you’ll need to take apart the whole juicer. And the collection cup is a bit small, so you can only make one cup of juice at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Poorbi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The juicer gets the job done for the most part but there are major drawbacks. 1. The machine is made of cheap plastic that cracked during the first 2 days of use. 2. The machine is not as quiet as advertised. 3. It does not handle strawberries, cranberries, grapes, pineapple or celery well. 4. Celery and pineapple( skin removed)will clog up the pulp extraction port and require several cleaning’s while juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Girlgameher

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: $300 for this???? I’m baffled as to how this juicer got such high ratings. It gets clogged after just a couple of pieces of fruit. And the juice that comes out is mixed with pulp, which defeats the purpose of juicing. Sending this back for my $300 refund!
customer_reviews.author: S.S

customer_reviews.title: Received half of it twice.
customer_reviews.text: This juicer was very well reviewed however I have no idea if it is a good product as my shipment only included half of it. (It apparently comes in two boxes). I sent this one back and requested a replacement. I received it in a few days and it was the other half. Customer service was no help so I sent it back and now am juicerless.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: We Love our omega!
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job. We use it for celery juice every day, it is much quieter than our old juicer. I am excited that it also makes Almond milk, peanut butter. pasta, bread sticks, apple sauce, baby food, and sorbets! It is easy to clean. We hade it for 2 months already, still love our omega!
customer_reviews.author: Sj

customer_reviews.title: Takes the fun out of juicing.
customer_reviews.text: The assembly and cleaning are great on this machine. But juicing was alot more of a hassle then what I've seen in the videos for this machine. You have to cut up fruit and veggies in small chunks. That's a time consuming job on its own but chunks get stuck in the augger. I put in larger pieces and the same thing would happen. And spinach is a nightmare! Shoving dry spinach down the chute is a hassle and it doesn't juice it properly. Overall if you're just going to juice carrots and celery then its fine but a bit of a pricey machine just for that.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: There’s good and bad
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised with what I paid and what I have to go through to use it. It’s nice, but I have to cut my fruit and veggie into very very small pieces just to get it down the shoot. It turned my apples into one big mess, more like apple sauce. My carrots got stuck even after I cut them so small.. had to turn it off and take it apart just to fix the issue. It is quiet, it has great juice put out, but why is the shoot so dang small! It’s very hard to cut things small enough to fit and it takes so long to use just for a glass of juice
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I have always been against juicing and fad diets. However a close friend who finally beat cancer swore by juicing and specifically this product. I am a meat eater, and do not consume many veggies if any in my daily diet. That being said, I decided after many long conversations with my friend to give this a try. I can honestly say I have never felt better. The juicing has been amazing. I use it in addition to my normal diet. Simple as that. Easy to clean and use. Product it strong, durable and just fantastic. I wish I could contact the company directly and tell them the whole story!
customer_reviews.author: Zackeri V. Drill

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like this juicer and is thinking of returning it!
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is good if you put hard veggies like carrots, celery, beets etc but when you put softer veggies or fruits like cucumbers, apples it get stuck and it doesn’t go forward to the front. It is a pain cause I literally have to disassemble it to clean everything before I can proceed.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Pagarigan

customer_reviews.title: Not the newest model
customer_reviews.text: Although is advertised as a new model, please note that this is not a new model. NC900 is better if you are trying to juice celery. J8006HDS is compact and easy to use, but I found that my celery juice was coming out lukewarm. Also, celery sticks didn't fit in the shut so I had to cut vertically. Since I am planning to use it daily, I decided to pay a bit more and get the NC900 with it's the newer model.
customer_reviews.author: B. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: How do I clean this O ring?
customer_reviews.text: Does anyone know how to clean this gasket? I’ve only owned this for a month and it’s growing mold because I can’t clean the gasket o ring! As for review....this juicer is by far the best for veggies. Definitely doesn’t do soft fruit as good as others. I got rid of my other juicer for this one. I’d give it 5 stars if I could figure out how to clean the gaskets
customer_reviews.author: Lhousehold

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it nearly every day for months and it hasn't given me any trouble. I wish it was faster to juice and easier to clean because it takes about 20-30 minutes to make juice for me and my wife, then clean it all up, but that could be improved if I prepped everything the night before...my problem, not the juicer's.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Better Health
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer - have lost 75lbs since started juicing - my health has improved. This juicer is much better than using the blender as a juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Life!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant because of the price. It works wonders, best juicer I ever had, perfect for the leafy greens. Super quiet, my newborn sleeps through it. 1 thing to be aware of is that it does a great job at catching the foam from apples, pears, and cucumbers specifically so when I juice those I wind up spending alot of time emptying the strainer on the upside I'd rather do that than drink that gooky part
customer_reviews.author: Pam P.

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR APPLES
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of reviews, was excited to get the machine, gave it every benefit. But it doesn't work for apples. The input chute is so small, you spend all your time slicing apples (1/8 apple slice does not fit) and then you have to manually feed each little piece individually or they jam each other in the tube. Cleaning the machine itself was easy but then I noticed that the sink ended up looking like a compost bin because so much pulp has to be washed out of various parts. The juice looked like coffee latte and had an odd texture. It might be ok for other food but definitely not apples.
customer_reviews.author: bruce trescott

customer_reviews.title: It works good for most of vegetables and fruits
customer_reviews.text: This is my first juicer and I am generally happy with it. Mostly it works good specially for most of vegetables and fruits . But For some fruit like apple or pear it cannot take the entire juice out. It Doesn’t make alot of vibration or noise which is great specially if u live in an apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Behzad

customer_reviews.title: Motor Died within 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I used this juicer every other day to juice celery. Only. After 8 months the motor started to die. I have tried reaching out to Omega but they have not returned my emails.
customer_reviews.author: Jill G

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I read and read the reviews and finally went with this Juicer and am really glad. It's very quiet and VERY easy to clean. I remember my old cheap juicer from 20 some years ago - very hard to clean. This is a snap. Just a quick rinse and done. The Juice is fantastic. The juicing process, easy and quick. I'm glad I paid just a bit more for this one - money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: pw

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little juicer! Great power, super quiet, good quality and recommended by Medical Medium. This little guy should be in everyone's kitchen! Plus, you can even make pasta with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could probably juice a rock!!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!! WORTH THE INVESTMENT!! Omega is the perfect name for this juicer!!!!! It didnt flinch at ginger!! My other juicers had mild seizures when it came to juicing ginger. The discarded ginger and other veggies were so dry you could dehydrate it for tea!!
customer_reviews.author: philly girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent juicer
customer_reviews.text: If you dont like pulp this is the machine for you. It will juice greens, fruit and vegetables with very little pulp. We let the juice go through the sieve for even more pulp removal. You can adjust the nozzle for more squeeze or less. Open for things like carrots that tend to stop up juicers and tighter for citrus. It is heavy built and does not jump around or make much noise at all. Very easy to assemble for use and really easy to clean. You can clean parts in less than 5 minutes. Or just put in dish washer. Great machine. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Omega juicers are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this juicer for a little over a month and am in total love with it. This thing is a beast. Yes, it is more expensive than the other juicers out there, but you are paying for quality people! I have found it very simple to clean and in fact use it every day for juicing fruits & vegetables. Just a quick rinse off in the sink is all that is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Hiker Gal

customer_reviews.title: 3 month later
customer_reviews.text: Awesome juicer. Easy to use, easy to wash, easy to assemble dissemble. My wife is happy.
customer_reviews.author: exxx

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a year
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product for about 9 months, then the plastic connection between the black plastic cap & the clear hopper broke. I have to duct tape it together for each use now & this won’t last long because the stress of the discarded material pushing thru is too much for this weak plastic. I’ll be contacting Omega for replacement parts but have heard they aren’t cooperative.
customer_reviews.author: T. I. Martin

customer_reviews.title: This slow speed/cold press juicer is worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had the time to juice EVERY day. This juicer is everything the info said it would be. It is easy to assemble/disassemble and cleanup is easy too. I will add that soft fruit/veggies tend to clog the screen but it only takes moments to clean the screen and get back to juicing. It is very quiet and the pulp/peels definately come out dry. Since I am not trying to use it in a way it is not intended I expect to get a long life from this product.
customer_reviews.author: NAFA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The easy cleanup was a good surprise to me. It was so tedious with the centrifugal juicer that i would sometimes leave the parts in the sink for later so I could get out the door faster in the morning. I'd come home to gross, even harder to clean parts. Now, that mesh strainer is the size of a large ring and the other parts are quick and easy and they all fit in the juice bowl, a major plus for my tiny kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: MyFavoriteThings

customer_reviews.title: This product broke immediately upon ordering, will not order again.
customer_reviews.text: And to make it worse - amazon mis-understood my instructions to simply refund me and already ordered me a replacement which I do not want. I will not order any machinery from here again.
customer_reviews.author: sydney campos

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend to buy
customer_reviews.text: It lost part of paint after first carrot juice making
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will keep researching for a juicer
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is not the best tried doing simple small fruits like berries it definitely didn’t work. I wouldn’t recommend this juicer. I thought I had done my research but my first use the juicer was getting hot and I could smell something burning. My only thought is that possibly this is defective.
customer_reviews.author: missett

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: This juicer broke after the first day of use. The auger wouldn't turn. You could hear the motor running, but it would no longer turn. At $300+, an appliance should not be breaking down after one use. Tried to call their help line and their voicemail box was FULL. Either customer service is not picking up their voicemails in a timely manner, or the product is such a piece of junk that they have an overflow of people calling for help (or both). Packed the juicer up and sent it back. I'd skip this one if I were you.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my juicer.
customer_reviews.text: I love omega juicers. This one comes with extra pieces to make recipes like pasta & noodles which was a fun surprise (either because I didn’t read the description that said it came with them or because it’s an added bonus). I use this all the time and it’s extremely easy to use, clean & assemble. It’ll juice pretty much anything with no problem and the long warranty is an added bonus. Ill always recommend omega juicers.
customer_reviews.author: lily doyle

customer_reviews.title: A kitchen appliance that will be used every day!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I love this juicer. I am new to juicing and I have used it everyday since receiving it a month ago. It works well for juicing veggies both hard ones and leafy ones. I’ve been making some awesome spinach green juices. I’m not really fond of many vegetables but being able to juice them has given new meaning to complete a healthy eating lifestyle. I would not recommend it for citrus juicing though, perhaps it’s my inexperience but I thought it would juice everything, but even so I am so happy with this juicer. I use the dried veggie waste in my compose pile and find that cleaning the machine is not burdensome.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: WORST PRODUCT EVER
customer_reviews.text: I had not even finished juicing my first 2 cups of spinach before the machine started smoking and then died! This was the replacement juicer because the first juicer stopped working during my first recipe. I am now looking into buying a different brand because Omega has failed me twice! I would not recommend this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not working properly
customer_reviews.text: This product is the worst. I was not able to get a drop of juice. I tried everything from vegetable to fruits. Nothing worked. Both juice and pulps was stuck inside the machine and just made my kitchen a mess. I returned it after one day of struggle. Its just waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Faran

customer_reviews.title: So in love!!
customer_reviews.text: We are soo in love With this juicer. My husband hates fruits and vegetables that I have been able to get him to drink an 18 ounce bottle every morning for the last two days so we’re on our way to health! Would definitely buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!
customer_reviews.text: What a complete waste of... Everything. This thing does not function as described. The pulp does not get pushed out correctly. The juice is full of pulp and particles. The shoot is so freakin small that you have to just about mince everything before juicing. Complete garbage. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Meehl

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer so much!!! First cold press juicer I’ve bought and I did a ton of research to decide on this one, and it’s not disappointing at all. We have made it a daily habit and the benefits are clear and we are feeling very good. Def recommend this and you don’t have to know anything to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Colligan

customer_reviews.title: Makes juicing easy.
customer_reviews.text: After my fourth try I finally bought this juicer and it is fantastic. Not bad to clean. Recommended by the Medical Medium but I didn’t want to spend that much. When I tried other cheaper models they were horrible. This one is worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Caroline 711

customer_reviews.title: Starting smoking after one use!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful experience! After using this product ONCE, it began to overheat and smoke started flowing out of it. I switched it off and then it wouldn’t turn back on and the smoke kept coming out for the next 15 minutes!! My whole kitchen smells like smoke and fire now. I let it cool down and it still wouldn’t turn on. Awful and safety hazard, do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Riva

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: Juicer arrived same day but unfortunately it was apparently pre-owned as there was still pulp wrapped around the juicers auger. Returned and bought a brand new one at a big box. Love my new Omega, it's a sturdy machine that works great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Black-Williams

customer_reviews.title: A quality juicer
customer_reviews.text: I've tried two juicers before this one. Both from Amazon. Both were cheaper and terrible. This juicer is great. Strong, doesnt get clogged easily, easy to clean and makes good juice. A quality product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen cummins

customer_reviews.title: No “Instant” Gratification
customer_reviews.text: The prep time took too long due to the narrow chute. Cleanup wasn’t easy. Produced lots of pulp. Liked the design but wish it had a wider chute.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Fean

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, you can probably find something better for $100
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible. I pay over $300 and expected a great juicer in return.. instead it clogs every freaking time. Stay away from this product, I regret buying this and threw away the box and not sure if i can even return it now.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer for greens
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer, just know it works better on hard veg - works great for celery and kale and carrots etc. apples it works on, but you can see a loss of juice and anything softer it is also ineffective on. Perfect for most greens tho just not softer fruits
customer_reviews.author: Natalie P.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok I guess.  Love the easy clean up.
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning is very easy and does a great job juicing greens. Buy didn’t do well juicing soft fruits/veggies like cucumbers and oranges. And it’s NOT BPA free plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Melgira

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a juicer before and after buying this one I don't know why. This thing is amazing and I love that I can make homemade noodles, bread sticks, and sorbet, not just juice. I would recommend anyone to buy this as it's super easy to set up, break down and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Peterson

customer_reviews.title: So great! And easy to clean! Biggest obstacle! Right!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely nothing to dislike here. Dry pulp for celery, no creepy foam and no overheating! And so easy to clean! I was completely shocked that it it so easy to clean, Y'all! Really!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best overall juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first juicer. I've been juicing since 1996 but my other juicer finally needed to be replaced. This one is incredible. Well-designed, easy to use and clean, quiet, and I find I'm getting more juice from my fruits and vegetables. I highly recommend this juicer to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: shesgotfire

customer_reviews.title: Love it but can overheat with larger batches of juice
customer_reviews.text: Love the juicer, easy to use, great yield especially on leafy greens. One downside is that if you try to make a larger batch of juice the juicer overheats and shuts down for a couple hours until it cools off.
customer_reviews.author: Ajorton51

customer_reviews.title: Be aware it's 120 V ...
customer_reviews.text: I did received the juicer but the only problem it works with 120V electricity so I don't understand why Amazon mentioned it's available in Indonesia. On top of that it doesn't mention anywhere that user should be careful to use 120V instead of 220V. So guess what happen smoked came out of the machine and stoped. Now I am waiting for a transformateur and will see if it still can worked. Really guys this is not professional I will not order any electricity appliance from Amazon sorry and I am so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Watch how long you run the juicer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing juicer but if ran too long, longer than 45 minutes it over heats and shuts off. Since it is a slow process we have to watch how long we let the engine run. It’s amazing for leafy greens and takes forever with soft fruits, we had to keep switching produce in the juicer to keep in time so it doesn’t overheat. Haven’t tried milks or other processes yet just juices so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Don’t hesitate to get this juicer, it’s the best masticating juicer, easy to clean and you get the most juice out of your veggies. I am juicing only celery and I am so happy that I chose the Omega juicer for this, THE BEST and tastes great too. I compared Omega with the cheap juicer and taste is different and cheap juicer produces too much foam.
customer_reviews.author: sara bek

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t perform as expected. Everything seemed to jam the strainer. I returned the unit and will be happy with my Breville high speed juicer for now, less hassle and really is there THAT much heat in a high speed unit?
customer_reviews.author: N/A

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I wish the chute was a little wider and the masticating produced higher yield but I love this juicer. It comes apart easily for cleaning and is top shelf dishwasher safe. Less noise than a blender and slow but the juice is SO good and nutrient rich!
customer_reviews.author: Geezmom

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well & pretty easy to clean. I have been using it quite a bit lately and the fresh juices are pretty good and much cheaper than buying Naced juice in the store. Not to mention that you can mix more to your liking. Order a recipe book for ideas.
customer_reviews.author: nadnee

customer_reviews.title: In love with this juicer.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this juicer. It even juices leafy greens. Easy to clean. You do need to cut your veggies in small pieces. I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Anutkini Glazki

customer_reviews.title: Big safer
customer_reviews.text: Just love this machine. It is also a big money save. The amount of lives I had to use in a ordinary machine dropped almost 3 times
customer_reviews.author: isabel matos

customer_reviews.title: wheat grass excellent juicer
customer_reviews.text: it is heavy duty enough to do a great job. Wonderful design. Great motor that performs well Good value for what other machines offer but ar we twice the monet of this well designed machine
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It's working great for now. Time will tell how it holds up. It extracts juice much better than a centrifugal, which leaves a lot of wet pulp. With this juicer even cucumber pulp comes out pretty dry.
customer_reviews.author: labyrinthodont6

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!! Unresponsive customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!This was a terrible product to buy, we had issues from day 1 with a gasket and despite multiple calls from us and Amazon, we couldn’t get the manufacturer or supplier to replace the defective part...
customer_reviews.author: Chuma

customer_reviews.title: Grea juicer but not for apples
customer_reviews.text: After adding a couple of apples it creates like a mash that almost never goes away - annoying and time-wasting (see the video attached). Otherwise, it's a good juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Single Reader

customer_reviews.title: Received used item, when I purchased as new
customer_reviews.text: This came used. The box was open, all bags for the individual parts as well. The juicer was dirty, you could see someone had used it before. Very disappointing considering I spent over $300 on this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning and mess is the biggest issue of any juicer. This guy beats down the main problem, hands down. Other thing is it extracts whatever can be extracted.
customer_reviews.author: vaibhavpsingh

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only juiced citrus and pears. It does a fantastic job on the citrus, not so great for the pears. Not sure if it's the type of pear? Got a little bit of juice but it did make a tasty pear sauce though... Anyway, very quiet, super easy to clean, and dishwasher safe. I have never juiced before so I don't have anything to compare it to.
customer_reviews.author: Tina F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, quiet and works great. I put the pieces in the dishwasher. No complaints. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing the cleaning brush from the package and cannot find out how to report this
customer_reviews.text: I am missing the cleaning brush from the package and cannot find out how to report this. The juicer works well but the adjustable end cap came off several times during my first juicing.
customer_reviews.author: stephen lewis

customer_reviews.title: Parts break and no customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this model in September 2019, January 2020 it already has broken parts. Adjustable end cap broke and online customer service post Sorry, we are moving warehouses and parts orders cannot be processed for a short time period. Please check back for future availability. I tried to call the customer service line and was on hold for 15 minutes before I had to hang up...
customer_reviews.author: Neil J Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good cold press juicer. Easy to clean, easy to take apart, and easy to put back together.
customer_reviews.author: Luvbuss

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little machine! ( our starter machine)
customer_reviews.text: I have used it now going on a week, and am very impressed that it has held up with the crazy amount of juicing for 6 people!!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: after a month of daily use it's been great
customer_reviews.text: I gave the Omega juicer a little bit of a down grade on the noise even though I don't mind the noise myself I can understand how in some situations it might be an issue. Otherwise I think it's a wonderful product that is very well designed. They wouldn't give a 15 year guarantee on something that wasn't great.
customer_reviews.author: DaPete

customer_reviews.title: Very good machine.
customer_reviews.text: I love the juice it makes but it’s best for the machine if you peel the fruit first. It really does get clogged if you don’t. I know I did a lot of fruit at one time and the motor got hot but I was able to get finished before long.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Rae Dobbert

customer_reviews.title: So far, it seems to be a really good juicer!
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t had this juicer long, but so far it seems to be a great juicer!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t extract as much juice as it should
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t extract the juice as well as the other cheaper juicers. So much pulp comes out it’s a waste. Tried to make almond butter and still small chunks come out. Not buttery as all even though I ran it through 4x with coconut oil as their book suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Jayon Kimm

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not discreet packaging
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but it says exactly what it is on almost every side of the box
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Product Quality A Bust
customer_reviews.text: 1st machine arrived and worked once. Had to return and wait several weeks for replacement. 2nd machine arrived, worked once and the o-ring on the pulp nozzle tore immediately. Have tried to contact Omega multiple times and there doesn't appear to be any humans who work there. Very frustrating and not a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheaper juicer and that was a huge mistake. I bought this one after and I absolutely love it! You won't go wrong with this juicer. Easy to assemble, clean, the pulp is super dry so you're getting every drop. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic juicer! I absolutely love it! It extracts more juice than any juicer I’ve had before, and does it in the most nutritious and healthy way. I highly recommend this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Juicing is healthy and fun
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product its so simple to use. I use it to make carrot juice mostly but starting to mix things up its really fun. Its been 4 months and no problem with the juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Quilmas

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Be careful what and how much you put into this device it could shut down on you for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Native East

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This is our replacement one and thankfully this one is brand new.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Great quiet juicer
customer_reviews.text: It is very quite and a great juicer. This came highly recommended by friends that already had it. We are very happy with it and have been using it since we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Noemy G.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. Easy to use, fresh juice is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Tried 4 and this brand by fare is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, not noisy and juices at a very high percentage.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this juicer to replace a cheaper model that was terribly difficult to assemble and disassemble- rookie mistake! I use this one daily, and it is so fast and easy to take apart, clean, and put back together. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Judith A Engle

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Much better than all the others we have had. It is more expensive but the difference is humongous
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Omega J8006HDS Nutrition Center Quiet Dual-Stage Slow Speed Masticating Juicer Makes Fruit and Vegetable 80 Revolutions per Minute High Juice, 200-Watt, Silver
product_meta.description: The Omega J8006 nutrition center is a masticating style juicer. Sometimes referred to as a low speed juicer, the nutrition center processes at 80Rpm, whereas most other juicers process at a speed of 1, 650 to 15, 000Rpm. The low speed protects and maintains healthy enzymes, prevents oxidation and allows juice to be stored up to 72 hours without degradation. The Ultem auger is 8x stronger than most other plastics and the powerful gear Reduction is equivalent to a 2HP motor. The dual stage juice processing system extracts the maximum amount of juice from fruits, vegetables, leafy greens, even wheatgrass! You can also use the nutrition center to turn nuts into nut butters (an all-natural peanut butter), make baby food from natural, fresh ingredients, whip up soy milk, extrude pasta, grind Coffee and spices, and mince herbs and garlic. Make delicious and nutritious drinks and snacks that everyone will love. Measuring 7in wide, 15. 5in deep and 8. 5in tall. Usage of more frozen foods (fruit, ice cream, etc. ) than liquids leads to the foods sticking to the sides of blender jars or the mixture becomes stiff (frozen) and will not flow. The juice screen is already installed in the juicer note: some noise is to be expected. Please set the juicer on top of a thin towel to help stabilize and mitigate noise. As a natural immune booster, Omega Cold Press Juicers deliver a potent dose of antioxidants to boost and support overall health and immunity. Cold press juicing is one of the most effective ways to easily access nutritious enzymes that help to improve immunity and overall health. Don’t eat your fruits and veggies—juice them! Get a day’s worth of vitamins in one delicious juice!
feature_bullets: INDUSTRY LEADING 15-YEAR coverage on parts and performance
LONGER LASTING JUICES - Using a low speed of 80 RPMs results in minimal heat buildup and oxidation promoting healthy enzymes
BOOST YOUR IMMUNITY - Cold press juicing is one of the most effective ways to easily access nutritious enzymes and antioxidants that boost immunity and enhance overall health.
HEALTHY AND DELICIOUS JUICES - Extracts the maximum amount of nutrients, vitamins, taste and juice from minimum amounts of celery, carrots, leafy greens and other fruits, vegetables, or wheatgrass.
NUTRITION CENTER - Turn nuts into nut butter, extrude pasta, grind Coffee and spices, mince herbs and garlic, make baby food and frozen desserts, and whip up soy milk in a flash
FEATURES - High juice yield with very dry pulp, an automatic pulp-ejection function for continuous juicing, four stabilizing feet, and quiet operation
HIGHLIGHTS - The adjustable end cap has 5-settings for maximum juice output and extraction. Enjoy continuous juicing. Powerful motor dual-stage juicing system ensures maximum efficiency
All components included, built in handle
110/120 Volt model designed exclusively for use in North America. Coverage valid in North America only.

When buying, please check whether the product is "Ships from and sold by " just below the product price to make sure you are receiving this product from the manufacturer of Omega to ensure your product is honored.
